Name: Number of concepts
Description: Number of senses linked to Concepticon

Name: Number of forms
Number of senses
has the same word form for foot and leg
Description:
Computes if two concepts are expressed with the same form in a language (i.e. if they are
colexified).
Feature_Spec: {"id": "LegAndFoot", "name": "has the same word form for foot and leg", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.lexicon.Colexification", "args": [["FOOT"], ["LEG"]], "kwargs": {"ablist": ["FOOT OR LEG"], "alabel": null, "blabel": null}}, "type": "bool", "note": null, "categories": {"null": "missing data", "true": "colexifies FOOT and LEG", "false": "does not colexify FOOT and LEG"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.concepts"]}

Name: arm and hand distinguished or not
Description:
Computes if two concepts are expressed with the same form in a language (i.e. if they are
colexified).
Feature_Spec: {"id": "ArmAndHand", "name": "arm and hand distinguished or not", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.lexicon.Colexification", "args": [["ARM"], ["HAND"]], "kwargs": {"ablist": ["ARM OR HAND"], "alabel": null, "blabel": null}}, "type": "bool", "note": "same as: WALS 129A, APICS 112", "categories": {"null": "missing data", "true": "colexifies ARM and HAND", "false": "does not colexify ARM and HAND"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.concepts"]}

Feature_Spec: {"id": "BarkAndSkin", "name": "bark and skin distinguished or not", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.lexicon.Colexification", "args": [["BARK", "BARK OR SHELL"], ["SKIN", "SKIN (HUMAN)", "SKIN (ANIMAL)"]], "kwargs": {"ablist": ["BARK OR SKIN"], "alabel": "BARK", "blabel": "SKIN"}}, "type": "bool", "note": null, "categories": {"null": "missing data", "true": "colexifies BARK and SKIN", "false": "does not colexify BARK and SKIN"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.concepts"]}

Name: elbow and knee are partially colexified or not
Description:
Computes if forms for the two concepts share a substring (of length >= 3).

.. note:

    The substring is computed based on the from value, i.e. using whatever transcription
    is provided. It does not operate on graphemes of a segmented form.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "CommonSubstringInElbowAndKnee", "name": "elbow and knee are partially colexified or not", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.lexicon.SharedSubstring", "args": [["ELBOW"], ["KNEE"]], "kwargs": {"ablist": null, "alabel": null, "blabel": null}}, "type": "None", "note": null, "categories": {"null": "missing data", "true": "common substring in ELBOW and KNEE", "false": "no common substring in ELBOW and KNEE"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.concepts"]}

Name: eye partially colexified in tear
Description:
Computes if two concepts are partially colexified, i.e. if a form for the first concept is
contained in a form for the second concept.
